Key Match Events: India completed a clean sweep against Sri Lanka with a Super Over win
Suryakumar Yadav scored a crucial 46 off 34 balls for India
Riyan Parag and Rinku Singh took 4 wickets between them for India
Maheesh Theekshana took 3 wickets for Sri Lanka
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka won the toss and opted to bowl first
India's Playing XI included Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, Suryakumar Yadav, and Riyan Parag
Post-Match Reflections: Washington Sundar was named the Player of the Match for his all-round performance
Suryakumar Yadav was named the Player of the Series
Gautam Gambhir praised the Indian team's performance and said that they executed their mission to win the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium, Kandy
The live streaming of the match was available on Disney+ Hotstar in South Africa
The live telecast of the match was available on the Star Sports network
